alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:57AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Calhoun, north central Orangeburg and southern Richland Counties through 530 AM EDT... At 456 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Orangeburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, St. Matthews, Orangeburg County Airport, Claflin College, Edisto Gardens, South Carolina State University, Cameron, Fort Motte, Wilkinson Heights, Prince of Orange Mall, Edisto, Creston and Lone Star. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 138 and 150. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg; Richland
